document.full_text: novak djokovic won his 26th straight match to remain unbeaten in 2011, defeating slovenia's blaz kavcic 6-3, 6-2 friday in the serbia open quarterfinals.
document.title: djokovic, unbeaten in 2011, advances in serbia
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic won his 26th straight match to remain unbeaten in 2011, defeating slovenia's blaz kavcic 6-3, 6-2 friday in the serbia open quarterfinals.
